plot: Several people are spending their evening in a cafe. Two gossipping girls, two debating men, a bookworm and a boy, who just broke up with his girlfriend. The cafe's waitress starts a chat with him, persuading him to take a look at certain easel, while other customers begin to notice unusual things.
vintage: 2002-10-26 (aired on NHK-BS1, in the '10 min. theater' slot)
